Sentencas: A three-dimensional mathematical model coupling the electrochemical kinetics with fluid dynamics is developed to simulate the heat and mass transfer in the one-cell stack of planar solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Effects of operations and structural parameters on the one-cell stack performance of planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Based on flow uniformity analysis, the distributions of temperature, current density, overpotential loss and other performance parameters in various operating parameters are obtained using a commercial CFD code (Fluent) coupled with the external subroutines programmed by VC++.
Titulo: Effects of operations and structural parameters on the one-cell stack performance of planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Numerical flow data are observed in good agreement with experimental results reported in the literature.
Titulo: Effects of operations and structural parameters on the one-cell stack performance of planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Results show that the one-cell stack in counter flow case has the advantages in better uniform current density and temperature distributions of PEN (Positive/Electrolyte/Negative) structure in the width direction, higher power output.
Titulo: Effects of operations and structural parameters on the one-cell stack performance of planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: fuel utilization factor and fuel efficiency than that in co-flow case.
Titulo: Effects of operations and structural parameters on the one-cell stack performance of planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: For counter flow case, better thermoelectric characteristics are observed in the temperature gradient, power output, fuel utilization factor and fuel efficiency with the decrease in the fuel inlet flow rate or the anode porosity.
Titulo: Effects of operations and structural parameters on the one-cell stack performance of planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Increasing the air inlet flow rate and decreasing the fuel inlet temperature will reduce the temperature gradient; power output, fuel utilization factor and fuel efficiency are enhanced with the increase of the air inlet temperature and the decrease of the anode pore size and thickness.
Titulo: Effects of operations and structural parameters on the one-cell stack performance of planar solid oxide fuel cell
